```{r}
library(deSolve)
```

```{r}
HIVTB = function(time, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)), {
    dS = caplambda - (beta*c*S*(I+J3)/N) - lambda*sigma*S*(Jas/R) - mu*S
    dL = beta*c * (S + T)*(I+J3)/N - lambda*sigma*L*(Jas/R) - ( mu+k+r1)*L
    dI = k*L - (mu+d+r2)*I
    dT = r1*L + r2*I - beta*c*T*(I+J3)/N - lambda*sigma*T*(Jas/R) - mu*T
    dJ1 = lambda*sigma(S+T)*(Jas/R) - beta*c*J1*(I+J3)/N - (alpha1 + mu)*J1 + ras*J2
    dJ2 = lambda*sigma*L*(Jas/R) - beta*c*J1*(I+J3)/N - (alpha1 + mu+kas+ras)*J2
    dJ3 = kas*J2 - (alpha3 + mu + das)*J3
    dA = alpha1*J1 + alpha2*J2 + alpha3*J3 - (mu+f)*A
    list(c(dS, dL, dI, dT, dJ1, dJ2, dA))
  })
}
```

Parameters:

```{r}
params = c(
S = 
L = 1333890.72,
I = 
T = 
J1 = 72300,
J2 = 
J3 = 4700,
A = 0.166,

N = 8336817,
R = 
Jas = 77000,
caplambda = 
c = 
sigma = 0.009,
mu = 555.1,
k = 0.09,
kas = 0.1,
d = 0.02,
das = 0.0047,
f = 21.35,
r1 = 70,
r2 = 0.921,
ras =
alpha1 = 0.0023,
alpha2 = 0.0023,
alpha3 = 0.0023
)
```


```{r}
times=seq(1,1000*365,by=1)

sim=ode(y=state,times=times,func=HIVTB,parms=params)
```
